fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Chapter Engagement with Drill-Down
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to create a master-detail report showing chapter-level engagement summary followed by top members within the most engaged chapter.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Create a chapter engagement report showing each chapter's member count, event participation, and average member tenure. Then show me the top 5 most active members in the chapter with the highest engagement.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes two parts: summary and drill-down
Summary shows all chapters with engagement metrics
Drill-down identifies the most engaged chapter and shows its top 5 members
